title: My Battery % is being weird please help.
content:
PIXEL 4XL BATTERY ISSUES
Starting about 3 days ago my battery has started acting quite strange with bouncing around on percentages after a restart, mainly sticking at around 50%. The phone also does not charge sometimes when plugged in. it shows that it is being charged but seems to gain no charges. -I have had the phone for about 10months. Any Fix for this or should I just go claim warranty from retailer?

Cheers.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
